mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_BOARD WHERE BRDDELETEFLAG='N'

SELECT BRDNO, BRDTITLE, BRDWRITER, TO_CHAR(BRDDATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') BRDDATE, BRDHIT FROM ( SELECT BRDNO, BRDTITLE, BRDWRITER, BRDDATE, BRDHIT , BRDDELETEFLAG, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY BRDNO DESC) BRDNO_SEQ FROM TBL_BOARD WHERE BRDDELETEFLAG='N') WHERE BRDNO_SEQ BETWEEN ${rowStart} AND ${rowEnd} ORDER BY BRDNO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_BOARD(BRDNO, BRDTITLE, BRDWRITER, BRDMEMO, BRDDATE, BRDHIT, BRDDELETEFLAG) VALUES (BRDNO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{brdtitle}, #{brdwriter}, #{brdmemo}, SYSDATE, 0, 'N' )
mapper.select: SELECT BRDNO, BRDTITLE, BRDWRITER, BRDMEMO, TO_CHAR(BRDDATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') BRDDATE FROM TBL_BOARD WHERE BRDDELETEFLAG='N' AND BRDNO=#{brdno}
